item.title: Fly tipped vehicle parts and rubbish, 7th February
item.description:
This grassed area is used as a dumping ground for vehicle parts, household waste and rubbish, some of which is used nappies and glass bottles. These is a large bramble bush growing on the area, some of the rubbish is beneath or within it but the vehicle parts are visible (in the photo, two tyres can be seen).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haldane Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Mattress on doorstep, 7th February
item.description:

item.title: Sunken Drain Gully, 7th February
item.description:
Sunken drain gully at about 5 meters before Bus Stop SM (BR5 4AX). Sharp edges can cause damage to vehicle wheels and cyclist can trip over. Originally reported 6th Dec but report disappeared without sorting out the issue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
